label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_026
content:
## 2024-08-26 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 109
- Active: 95
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 74
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 14

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 36
- Standard: 35
- Placebo: 38

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 4.5
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.1
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 23.4
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 6.5
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 382.0
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 31.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 27.6
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.0
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 6.0
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.2
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 2.0
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 1.8

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.7
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.2
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 39.0
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 9.5

- Standard Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 4.2

- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.0
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 3.9

- Placebo Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 7.0

### Physical Therapy

- Sessions Attended: 191
- Attendance Rate (%): 89.1

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-2671, Description: constipation, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-2616, Description: dizziness, Grade: 2, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-2652, Description: sedation, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-2611, Description: pruritus, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-2677, Description: dizziness, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-2634, Description: VAS assessment outside scheduled window, Severity: minor

### Events
- Subject retention call completed for 17 overdue visits
- Randomization module updated for new enrollment block

### Notes
- Week 26: Pain management assessments on track. 109 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
